info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:44AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, northeastern Rutherford, northwestern Alexander, Caldwell and Burke Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 443 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Blowing Rock to 8 miles north of Morganton to 3 miles south of Marion. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Marion, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Valdese, Gamewell, Hudson, Cajah`s Mountain and Drexel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
